import os
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

df['opp']=df['opp'].ffill()

source.2daa172e:
df['AT']=df['min'].apply(lambda x:0 if x.isalnum() else x.split('+')[1])
df['min']=df['min'].apply(lambda x:x.split('+')[0])
df['min']=pd.to_numeric(df['min'])
df['AT']=pd.to_numeric(df['AT'])
df.head()
source.d18dff3f:
df['assist']=df['assisted'].fillna(0)
df['solo']=df['assist'].apply(lambda x:'solo' if x==0 else 'assisted')
df.head()
source.70df18fa:
from datetime import date
df['date']=pd.to_datetime(df['date'])

df['year']=df['date'].apply(lambda x: x.year)
df['month']=df['date'].apply(lambda x: x.month)
df['month_w']=df['date'].apply(lambda x: x.strftime("%B"))
df.head()

print("Number of Goals Scored:")
print("Ronaldo : {}".format(df['player'].value_counts()['ronaldo']))
print("Messi : {}".format(df['player'].value_counts()['messi']))
plt.figure(figsize=(8,4))
sns.countplot(data=df,y='player',palette='Paired')
plt.show()

source.2edf33fc:
labels=['Home', 'Away']
explode=[0.01,0.01]

plt.figure(figsize=(10,5))
plt.suptitle('Where the Goals were scored')

plt.subplot(1,2,1)
plt.title('Ronaldo')
x=[df[df.player=='ronaldo'].venue.value_counts()['H'],
   df[df.player=='ronaldo'].venue.value_counts()['A']]
plt.pie(x=x, startangle=90, autopct='%1.2f%%', labels=labels,explode=explode,
       colors=['#FFAAA6','#A8E6CE'], wedgeprops={'width':0.7})

plt.subplot(1,2,2)
plt.title('Messi')
x=[df[df.player=='messi'].venue.value_counts()['H'],
   df[df.player=='messi'].venue.value_counts()['A']]
plt.pie(x=x, startangle=90, autopct='%1.2f%%', labels=labels,explode=explode,
       colors=['#FFAAA6','#A8E6CE'], wedgeprops={'width':0.7},)

plt.show()

source.5bd93e00:
labels=['Solo', 'Assisted']
explode=[0.01,0.01]

plt.figure(figsize=(10,5))
plt.suptitle('Solo or Assisted')

plt.subplot(1,2,1)
plt.title('Ronaldo')
x=[df[df.player=='ronaldo'].solo.value_counts()['solo'],
   df[df.player=='ronaldo'].solo.value_counts()['assisted']]
plt.pie(x=x, startangle=90, autopct='%1.2f%%', labels=labels,explode=explode,
       colors=['#FFAAA6','#A8E6CE'], wedgeprops={'width':0.7})

plt.subplot(1,2,2)
plt.title('Messi')
x=[df[df.player=='messi'].solo.value_counts()['solo'],
   df[df.player=='messi'].solo.value_counts()['assisted']]
plt.pie(x=x, startangle=90, autopct='%1.2f%%', labels=labels,explode=explode,
       colors=['#FFAAA6','#A8E6CE'], wedgeprops={'width':0.7},)

plt.show()
source.af8af056:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,8))
plt.subplot(2,1,1)
plt.title('Cristano(Goalposition)')
sns.countplot(data=df[df.pos!='NA'][df.player=='ronaldo'],x='year',hue='pos',palette="Paired")
plt.legend(loc='upper left')

plt.subplot(2,1,2)
plt.title('Messi (Goalposition)')
sns.countplot(data=df[df.pos!='NA'][df.player=='messi'],x='year',hue='pos',palette="Paired")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
source.c0bbce60:
plt.figure(figsize=(12,8))
plt.subplot(2,1,1)
plt.title('Cristano(Assists)')
sns.barplot(df[df.assist!=0][df.player=='ronaldo'].assist.value_counts().head(10).index,
           df[df.assist!=0][df.player=='ronaldo'].assist.value_counts().head(10).values)


plt.subplot(2,1,2)
plt.title('Messi (Assists)')
sns.barplot(df[df.assist!=0][df.player=='messi'].assist.value_counts().head(10).index,
           df[df.assist!=0][df.player=='messi'].assist.value_counts().head(10).values)

plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()

plt.figure(figsize=(12,8))

plt.title('Cristano(Assists)')
sns.barplot(df[df.player=='ronaldo'].opp.value_counts().head(10).index,
           df[df.player=='ronaldo'].opp.value_counts().head(10).values, palette='magma')


plt.subplot(2,1,2)
plt.title('Messi (Assists)')
sns.barplot(df[df.player=='messi'].opp.value_counts().head(10).index,
           df[df.player=='messi'].opp.value_counts().head(10).values, palette='magma')

plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
source.20834fc0:
* Ronaldo started his career as a Right winger, then transitioned to Left winger spot. 
* After 2014 Ronaldo is employed as Left winger or Center Forward in the team.
* Messi started as Right winger and then transitioned into being centre forward. 
* From 2015 onwards, Messi has not been used a lot as centre forward but in other positions as Right winger and Second Striker.
source.0e04e86d:
* Majority of Ronaldo's goal has come from left winger position.
* Messi is more versatile and has scored from different positions.
source.27c859f2: Ronaldo is currently leading in number of goals scored
source.8fb48476: Messi can be very dangerous in the dying minutes for the regular playing time. Ronaldo has scored more goals in the extratime.
source.08e6932a: Ronaldo has scored more goals than Messi away from home, confirming his claim that he derives motivation from the opposite team's fans booing him.
